cross_training_opportunities: Mid-level developer can learn Saga pattern and OpenTelemetry through pairing.
contractor_augmentation_option: Not required, but an option if scope increases.
cost_optimization: Team is sufficient. Low utilization in Sprint 2 suggests team could be partially allocated elsewhere.
future_scaling: Can absorb approx. 40% more backend work without scaling.

cross_training_opportunities: Train a backend developer in basic Terraform and pipeline monitoring.
contractor_augmentation_option: On-demand DevOps consultant for architectural reviews.
cost_optimization: Utilization is low post-Sprint 1; resource can be shared with other projects.
future_scaling: Single resource is a bottleneck for parallel projects.
